title: Champion Mastery, How it 'Should' help the community.
body:
I personally think this new champion mastery is amazing.
It gives lvl 30 summoners something to work on, I plan on at least getting lvl 2 with every champ.
It rewards more points based on KDA, meaning people 'Should' stop trying to go for 1 v 1 trades.
and actually focus on Not dying. While also trying to reach a better score, I do love how assist go into it as well.

I believe it will make everyone 'Eventually' play better as well, as they want to gain Kills + Assist, but do so without dying.
Meaning everyone will be thinking on how to advance.
Ive already reached lvl 3 with Sivir, Bruam and Gnar, and almost Azir now.

I also like on how it scores you as well.
like, "hmmmm you done better this time" or "Well, you could improve.... alot."

What does everyone Like/Dislike about it?
I really love it.
